A collection of machine learning and AI projects showcasing expertise in model development, deployment, and production-ready solutions.

Neural Vision Classifier

Deep learning model for image classification using Convolutional Neural Networks. Achieves 95%+ accuracy on benchmark datasets with optimized architecture and data augmentation.

Natural language processing system for sentiment analysis using transformer models. Processes social media data and customer reviews in real-time with 92% accuracy.

Interactive ML dashboard for business forecasting and data visualization. Features automated reporting, real-time model performance monitoring, and ARIMA forecasting.

Collaborative filtering and content-based recommendation engine. Deployed with FastAPI, optimized for large-scale user datasets with matrix factorization techniques.
